channel.title: Project Assignments on POLS 501: Advanced Political Research Design and Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Project Assignments on POLS 501: Advanced Political Research Design and Analysis

item.title: Proposal
item.description: Add the file doc/initial-proposal.md In a paragraph or two: State a research question. Describe what data you will use to answer the question. Discuss where and how will you get that data. Commit changes to GitHub. We will do this at the start of class

item.title: Proposal II
item.description: Instructions Add a Markdown or RMarkdown file in your named doc/initial-proposal.md to your project repository. Answer the questions in the next section in that file. To submit the assignment, Commit and push all changes GitHub Open an issue in your project repository Title it “Review Project Proposal II” Assign the issue to @jrnold and @calvinhgarner Submit the issue See the Project Workflow. Proposal In one to two paragraphs propose a research project for this course.

item.title: Data Analysis I (Data Wrangling and EDA)
